member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.Installer.Bootstrap.InstallerBootstrapConstants.LightInstallerEapName

members.member:
Nuget gallery used by bootstrappers until wave06.
The bootstrappers: 1) Look for "Wave" packages and take the max version. This version is considered as the latest. 2) Download "JetBrains.Platform.Installer" package of the latest version and all its dependencies. >
